dct_description_sm: American Geographical Society of New York. Briesemeister elliptical equal-area projection. On upper right margin: Atlas of distribution of diseases - plate 14. Maps: 1. [World population and winds currents related to occurrences of disease] -- 2. [World showing American leishmaniasis, oriental sore, kala azar, and climatic diagrams] -- 3. [Southern Europe] -- 4. [Portugal] -- 5. [Peru] -- 6. [Middle East]. Verso: Basic sources.
dct_publisher_sm: New York, NY : American Geographical Society, 1954.
